# Planning Documents

This directory contains implementation plans generated by the Planning Agent.

## Naming Convention
`plan_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.md`

## Purpose
Planning documents transform research findings into detailed, actionable implementation specifications that can be executed mechanically.

## Contents
- Executive summary with scope and success criteria
- Solution architecture and design decisions
- Phased task breakdown
- Detailed task specifications with exact code
- Dependency graphs
- Test plans
- Risk assessment and rollback procedures

## Usage
1. Planning Agent generates document here based on research
2. Implementation Agent consumes latest/specified plan document
3. Documents are retained for historical reference and audit
